content:
Craft an item of type: white_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 21}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 54, "index": 37}]
thought: To craft white_terracotta, I need to craft white_dye and place it in the middle of a 3x3 grid of terracotta. I will first move the bone_meal from slot 31 to slot 1 to craft the white_dye.
Ok
act: move from slot 31 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: white_terracotta
inventory=[{"type": "white_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "bone_meal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "terracotta", "quantity": 8, "index": 11}, {"type": "end_stone_brick_wall", "quantity": 41, "index": 21}, {"type": "parrot_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 26}, {"type": "bat_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 35}, {"type": "respawn_anchor", "quantity": 54, "index": 37}]
thought: Now I have the white_dye, I need to place it in the middle of a 3x3 grid of terracotta. I will first move the white_dye from slot 0 to slot 12 (the center of the crafting grid).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 1

thought: To craft the white_terracotta, I need to place the terracotta in the crafting table in the shape of a cross. Therefore I will first move one terracotta from slot 11 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1
